text: Karingozhakkal Mani Mani (30 January 1933 â€“ 9 April 2019) was an Indian politician. He was a member of Kerala Congress (M). He served as MLA of the Kerala Legislative Assembly from 1965 until his death. He was the longest serving MLA in Kerala's history. He was also of Minister of Revenue and Law, as well as Minister of Finance many times. Mani had chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). He died on 9 April 2019 in Kochi. He was 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Kerala
title: K. M. Mani
